For this reason, the technical committee issued the 1991 version of ISO/IEC 9126 to harmonise further development. C.4 Revision of ISO/IEC 9126 In 1994 it was felt that other Standards being produced in the area of product quality evaluation necessitated the revision of ISO/IEC 9126. The revision retains the same 6 quality characteristics, but clarifies their relationship to internal and external metrics.
